messages.content: Don't underestimate him, he can do it in 2
That's what I'd hope for! Retool the D day 1, if we could find a gem at QB day 2.
I really hope for it to fail miserably, so we can all agree on the sequel trilogy never happened.
Sounds really boring so I hope you like it
Hopefully we can get this solved soon.
So you’ve never had a fwb situation and if you have it made you worthless for a real relationship to other women? Hope this goes both ways
Hey it’s not bad though! Quick recovery, just follow their rules! Good luck!
So you're gay, but you hate men? Yeah, good luck with that working out for you.
Good luck with writing in the future :D Everyone has to have their critics...right?
I honestly hope you do that
My thoughts exactly, I hope [NAME] doesn't get too much hate.
Hope you're not [RELIGION], 'cause that ain't kosher...
Stick with us. If only for one more day. Then let’s try again tomorrow.
Oooo I see, I was hoping it wasn't a troll thing, it seemed really tasteless.
Hope his bare hands are as clean as the griddles. Ready to eat foods need to be handled with gloves . Very cool machine though .
I hope you get the help you need. Truly.
Omg I commented on your original post. I hope you’re doing better and I’m glad this all came out and you got closure.
I'm going to hold out hope for something minor even though it looked really bad. Just going to wait for the official news.
Hoping LSU can kill 2 minutes and 20 seconds of clock here and not let UCF score more...
toxic players will sure show you the ways soon enough. Hope you got the game for free.
If this happens in my dream then I will get up and do this.
I forsee success in your future endeavors.
That’s so scummy, I’m hoping the pepperoni just slid down?
Well it obviously helps you rationalize your total unwillingness to take action to make the world a better place. I hope that you grow past that.
Congratulations! Hard work always pays off! :) Hope you enjoy your new job!!
Surely hope so, buddy. Surely hope so.
Hope he gets rich from this too!
Really? Wow. You’re either hopelessly ignorant or you’re trolling. For your sake, I hope you’re trolling.
Holy balls! I hope that's your neighbor.
I sure hope so! Otherwise, I've been in the wrong sub.
Fine. I hope he has a fine wife and she’s fine if he shall need to pay a fine.
